title.narrative: Voluntary medical project to combat blindness and the diseases that cause it in the Republic of Sudan

description.narrative: 5000 cases were detected 405 cataract operations were performed 1250 glasses, medicines and eye drops were distributed
Providing medical services in the field of combating blindness and the diseases that cause it to beneficiaries with limited incomes

Providing patients' needs for medicines, glasses and lenses as needed. Removing the suffering of many blind people. Health education for everyone receiving treatment for prevention. Subsidy of the Ministry of Health in the recipient country that suffers from a shortage of ophthalmologists.
